inclusion.criterion: Desiring uterine aspiration for pregnancy or surgical management of a miscarriage
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Gestational age up to 13 weeks and 6 days to be established by best dating (i.e. last menstrual period or earliest ultrasound)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Treatment plan involves outpatient uterine aspiration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant able to provide informed consent in English and willing to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unable to read, speak, or understand English
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 16-year-old girl with myasthenia gravis, but she does not meet any exclusion criteria and meets some inclusion criteria.
